snippet.title: The War of the Worlds: Siberia — Premiere Trailer
snippet.description:
1C Game Studios presents a premiere trailer of The War of the Worlds: Siberia, an action-adventure game inspired by ideas from a science fiction novel by H. G. Wells. 

The year is 1896. The Martian invasion wipes cities and entire civilizations out of existence. Separated from his loved ones, a young student escapes the capital city already conquered by the aliens.

Add to your wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3276190/The_War_of_the_Worlds_Siberia/ 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Website: Siberiawotw.com/en 
VK: https://vk.com/waroftheworldssiberia 
Telegram: https://t.me/wotwsiberia  

Jobs at 1C Game Studios: https://1cgs.net/jobs  
VK: https://vk.com/1cgamestudios    
Telegram: https://t.me/gamestudios1c
